about_the_game:
This is a story of girls who throw themselves into battle for the reconstruction of Tokyo---

◆ Synopsis

The story is set in a near-future Tokyo that has been devastated by the ""Great Collapse"". As a commander, the player will train and command the girls of the ""Doll Squad"", throwing themselves into battle together. The mysterious dreams the girls see, the mystery of the gate leading to another world, and the wishes of each girl.

Please enjoy the story of ""Tokyo's reconstruction and the intertwined feelings of the girls"" depicted in this work.

◆ Game Features

・36 beautiful girl characters, each with their own music and story

・A worldview set in a slightly future Tokyo than the present

・A ""rogue-like RPG"" that can be thoroughly played alone

・A pleasant play feeling where characters grow in a super short time

・Infinite strategic possibilities with deck organization and skill selection

・Multiplayer mode where players can form parties and explore dungeons together

・PvP and GvG challenges with the characters you have raised

◆ Characters and Songs

36 girls fighting to reclaim the collapsed Tokyo. Each of their juvenile feelings are expressed in 36 songs that color the girls. The full-scale songs created by a team of top-notch creators go beyond the framework of character songs and guide you to the deepest part of the story.

1st: "Seraphim"

Azumi Hongo (CV: Aina Suzuki)

Ritsu Ichimonji (CV: Izumi Yabune)

Wakana Minami (CV: Ayaka Kamimoto)

Kotoha Kazami (CV: Maki Yamaichi)

Komari Yuki (CV: Azumi Waki)

Suzuha Kazami (CV: Manaka Iwami)

2nd: "Thrones"

Miyako Sonozaki (CV: Rina Hidaka)

Natsuha Kisaragi (CV: Shiori Nakasaki)

Milia Kazuraba (CV: Ruka Yashiro)

Hina Hojo (CV: Nao Sasaki)

Aya Hino (CV: Misaki Ohashi)

Megumi Tenkuji (CV: Suzuko Mimori)

3rd: "Cherubim"

Luna Tsukuyomi (CV: Yoshino Aoyama)

Fuka Kagawa (CV: Yuka Takeuchi)

Setsuna Uozu (CV: Ikumi Hasegawa)

Nagisa Narumi (CV: Haruka Minami)

Nana Izumi (CV: Satomi Akesaka)

Yuki Banjo (CV: Aina Aiba)

4th: "Dominions"

Shiki Yaiba (CV: Yuki Harukawa)

Otoha Kamiyama (CV: Kokoro Omori)

Amano Shiranami (CV: Emi Nitta)

Mutsumi Sakurai (CV: Ami Mizuno)

Shizuku Fuwa (CV: Mariya Ise)

Tenka Amamiya (CV: Aimi)

5th: "Dynamis"

Sana Godai (CV: Yurie Igoma)

Hikari Kido (CV: Hazuki Ogino)

Ayaka Tsugami (CV: Ayana Taketatsu)

Nanami Kenzaki (CV: Maria Abo)

Mei Hidaka (CV: Akari Kito)

Rinoa Tendo (CV: Kana Asumi)

6th: "Exia"

Miko Ashihara (CV: Shuka Saito)

Rion Kaito (CV: Erina Koga)

Aoi Kamijo (CV: Ayasa Goto)

Momoka Asakura (CV: Shiori Tanaka)

Hotaru Akizuki (CV: Ai Kakuma)

Len Ruoxi (CV: Yu Serizawa)

name: De:Lithe Last Memories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 (Gen4 or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11（64bit）or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 (Gen4 or higher)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: An MMO action RPG where you team up with 36 girls called "Dolls" to reclaim a ruined Tokyo. A rogue-lite, soul-like experience, it's the "most addictive and Kawaii survivor game in the world."
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
